# JSON Web Token Provider

This provider provides a way to generate a valid JSON Web Token to be used on your Terraform code.

# Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    jwt = {
      source = "camptocamp/jwt"
      version = "1.1.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "jwt" {
  # This provider does not require any special configuration.
}
```
